nodes.text: A person served the Sith Empire as a Sith Knight, during the time of the Jedi Civil War. The Knight fell under the direct command of the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Revan, the leader of the Sith Empire, and also trained the Sith apprentice Darth Voren.

The Sith Knight was first mentioned in The Betrayal of Darth Revan, a role-playing supplement that was written by Patrick Stutzman and published in August 2008. In the supplement, the Knight was briefly referred to in Darth Voren's character description.
